data.message: Hey Em/Slim/Mr. Mathers.. I know this is a Longshot... but I've been a fan since I was 6... first song I ever heard was "Forgot about Dre" ever since I've listened to every song you've released.. "Kim" being the first of my favorites.. "stan" being the second.. why I'm trying to personally contact you... because I'm at my lowest point right now.. and I know the hell you seen and survived.. cause I'm going to the ER tomorrow because I may have cancer.... so if I'm gonna die.. I mays well try and meet my idol in persn before I die...

replies.message: I will do whatever to meet you in person..  i know you're super busy and have plenty of reasons not to even waste your time on me.. but having Cysts that maybe cancerous.... I figured I may as well try.. I know  you've had it atleast 10x worse as me.., but I've also been to hell and back, but i'm hoping you at least see this and consider trying to meet a fan.. or at least respond,, please and thank you..
